headline: Does the Recent Enphase Stock Rebound Signal a Turning Point for Investors in 2025?
summary: Thinking about Enphase Energy as an investment right now? If you’ve been watching the stock, you’ve probably noticed how dramatically it has moved lately. Over just the last week, shares rebounded 6.7%, but that comes after a long stretch of rough performance, including a 5.6% drop in the past month and a steep 48.8% loss year-to-date. Zoom out to the past year, and that pain becomes even clearer, with the stock down 60.1%. That is a dramatic reversal for a company that was soaring not long...
